rules_text:
When Dubious Proof enters the battlefield, create a tapped Evidence token. [i](It’s a Strange artifact with “{T}: Add {C}. If it’s not your turn, you can’t spend this mana to cast spells.”)[/i]
Creatures you control enter the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on them for each {V} spent to cast them. [i]({V} can be paid with one mana from a Strange source.)[/i]
